data.narrative: At 08:42 PM (Local time for New York, New York), a glimmer of hope flickers as Daniel finally pushes himself up from the couch. With firm intent, he heads towards the bedroom area to grab his laptop, and it is his intention to order dinner. Butter chicken, naan, samosas, and mango lassi, with medium spice, all paid for by Ava, what could go wrong now?

data.narrative: At 08:42 PM (Local time for New York, New York), after what feels like an eternity of back-and-forth, Ava watches as Daniel, stirred to long-awaited action, rises from the couch with purpose. The sound of his footsteps on the wooden floor (floorboards_creak_01) is music to her ears, knowing that she can order a meal soon. Yes! It has finally come to pass that is he heading now to get the Laptop. She remains perched, hoping he can execute this important and challenging task. The smell of Jasmine is in the air, at the window with rain and the fog, as well as the faint sound of a nearby T.V.
